modName: Somewhat Skimpy DragonScale Armour with CBBEv2 version
summary: Title says it all really. There probably are half a dozen skimpy dragonscale/bone armours out there. Here\'s my take on the light armour.
descriptionHtml:
Check the mirror tab. from now on I\'ll post updates on my own website
version 0.1 - http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/somewhat-skimpy-dragonscale-armour/v0.1/

[size=\'4\']Version 0.2 Vanilla AND CBBE are now available[/size]
check the [u]mirrors[/u] tab or copy and paste the following link in your browser
http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/somewhat-skimpy-dragonscale-armour/v0.2/

Alt. version without belly strip now available at
http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/somewhat-skimpy-dragonscale-armour/alt-versions

[b]Please do NOT upload my mods to other websites or torrents. thank you.[/b]


[size=\'3\'][color=\'red\'][b]An important announcement. I will no longer post my files on the nexus websites but rather on my own website (link above). If you would like to receive updates when I make new mods and the like, I have a facebook page and twitter you can subscribe to. Links are on my website.[/b][/color][/size]


[size=6]Somewhat Skimpy DragonScale Armour v0.2 [/size]
 By Ketwaroo D. Yaasir

 Somewhat skimpy for female characters. turns out it\'s better looking than I thought.

 I should also mention version 0.1 is based of the vanilla game bodies.

 while you\'re reading this, check out the awesome pictures posted by gin4ex
in the user contributed section.

[size=4]Installation[/size]

 Extract meshes folder and all contents to your Skyrim Data folder.
 That\'s about it for this first version.
 
[size=4]Notes[/size]
 
 This mod does not modify game textures, so no need for those. You
 can use alternative textures from other mods for the armour or body
 if you like.
 
 Weight Slider works. So it is safely equipable by all females PC and NPC. 
 

== Version History ==
 0.2
  - cbbe version available at http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/somewhat-skimpy-dragonscale-armour/v0.2/
 0.1
  - initial release.
  - there might be some minor clipping here and there.
  - to do: CBBE version.
author: Ketwaroo D Yaasir
